summary: The Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra is a powerful smartphone with an excellent processor, long battery life, and a high-quality camera. However, it is large, heavy, and comes with pre-installed bloatware, making it a pricey option.
pros: Insanely powerful processor (great for gaming and productivity)
Stunning 200MP camera with incredible zoom capabilities
Long battery life with fast charging
S-Pen support is unique and useful
cons: Heavy and large, making one-handed use uncomfortable
name: Nitish Singh
